meanings.definition: A person who believes in or supports teleology.
meanings.sent1: Many teleologists study nature to understand purpose.
meanings.sent2: The teleologists gathered to discuss their theories on design in the universe.
meanings.sent3: The teleologists joked that even the ants might have a grand plan.
meanings.sent4: In the eyes of the teleologists, every leaf seemed to whisper a secret purpose.
meanings.sent5: The teleologists' passion for finding meaning in everything was contagious.

meanings.sent1: The teleologists presented their findings at the conference.
meanings.sent2: We invited the teleologists to share their perspectives on evolution.
meanings.sent3: The teleologists' meeting turned into a lively debate about destiny.
meanings.sent4: The room buzzed with energy as the teleologists delved into their research.
meanings.sent5: Among the teleologists, there was a shared sense of purpose and curiosity.
